process.name: contact
process.description: you get in contact with me

process.name: estimate
process.description: i send you an cost estimate for the required work

process.name: creation
process.description: Once the cost estimate is agreed upon, the creative work begins. It is a game of trial and error. The drafts, that pass the test are getting refined.

process.name: presentation
process.description: a presentation is delivered that includes all branding items

process.name: production
process.description: Once the presentation is cleared for production, all deliverables are being produced.

services.name: Services
services.description: From Corporate Design and Content to Print and Web Production, I help your Brand to reach its Audience.

workTitle: Ideas • Identities • Illustration • Animation • Web Design
featuredWorkDescription: Here are some of my favourite projects
processTools: Learn about my process and tools
contactCopy: If you need a designer or have any questions about my work, or just want to say ‘Hi!’,</br>please don’t hesitate to drop me a line.</br>(english/deutsch)
